long_description: A great bike for kids ready for longer distances and more independence, the Diamondback Jr. Viper 20 in. boys' bike is ready to roll to school, follow along on the riverside path or hit the BMX park. Sturdy steel frame and fork are built to handle the rigors of riding. Single-speed drivetrain offers simplicity and low maintenance. Linear-pull rear brake provides stopping power when needed. Stout BMX 20 in. wheels are outfitted with Comp III style tires for all-around performance. Specs on the Diamondback Jr. Viper 20 in. boys' bike are subject to change.
short_description: A great bike for kids ready for longer distances and more independence, the Diamondback Jr. Viper 20 in. boys' bike is ready to roll to school, follow along on the riverside path or hit the BMX park.
